# Download And Unzip Data

# download a zip file containing broadband data, save it to the working directory
download.file("https://d396qusza40orc.cloudfront.net/repdata%2Fdata%2Factivity.zip", destfile="Proj1.zip")

# unzip the file
unzip("Proj1.zip")

# read the data into R
data <- read.csv("activity.csv")

#Format date
data$date= strptime(data$date, "%Y-%m-%d")

#Mean per day

library(plyr)

###1

totalsteps= ddply(data, .(date), summarize,  steps=sum(steps))

mean=mean(totalsteps$steps, na.rm=TRUE)
median= median(totalsteps$steps, na.rm=TRUE)
hist(totalsteps$steps, breaks=11))
abline()
